issue.title: [Docs] Add reference of the cookbook contrib page to New Contributor's Guide
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17888](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17888). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add a reference to <https://github.com/apache/arrow-cookbook/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md> with some extra info bout the referenced material to the New COntributor's Guide.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17888?focusedCommentId=17612362) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
